column4: could be its not a feature in the pae kernel. How much ram you got?
I installed a non-PAE 2.6.35-25-generic, it also has no cpufreq modules in /lib/modules/.../kernel/, and nothing in /sys/devices/system/cpu/cpufreq/ or /sys/devices/system/cpu/cp0/cpufreq/
dli and others: Thanks for the guidence.
